name: ConfigureBulkTagsForMetrics
description:
Configure bulk tags for specified metrics in Datadog.

Use this tool to create and define queryable tag keys for existing count, gauge, rate, and distribution metrics in Datadog by specifying a metric name prefix. It manages tags configurations and sends results to account email addresses. Suitable for users with 'Manage Tags for Metrics' permission.

parameters.name: metric_name_prefix
parameters.description: A text prefix used to match against metric names for bulk tags configuration.

value_schema.description: A text prefix to match against metric names.

parameters.name: metric_bulk_configure_tags_resource
parameters.description: The resource identifier for configuring bulk tags for metrics. Must be set to 'metric_bulk_configure_tags'.

value_schema.description: The metric bulk configure tags resource.

parameters.name: notification_emails
parameters.description: A list of account emails to notify when the configuration is applied.

value_schema.description: A list of account emails to notify when the configuration is applied.

parameters.name: actively_queried_tags_window_seconds
parameters.description: Time window in seconds for configuring actively queried tags for matching metrics. Minimum is 1 second, maximum is 7,776,000 seconds (90 days).

value_schema.description:
When provided, all tags that have been actively queried are
configured (and, therefore, remain queryable) for each metric that
matches the given prefix.  Minimum value is 1 second, and maximum
value is 7,776,000 seconds (90 days).

parameters.name: tags_to_apply
parameters.description: A list of tag names to apply to the metric configuration in Datadog.

value_schema.description: A list of tag names to apply to the configuration.

parameters.name: exclude_configured_tags
parameters.description: Set to true to exclude configured tags and include all other tags. Defaults to false.

value_schema.description:
When set to true, the configuration will exclude the configured tags and include any other submitted tags.
When set to false, the configuration will include the configured tags and exclude any other submitted tags.
Defaults to false.

parameters.name: override_existing_configurations
parameters.description: Set to true to override any existing configurations for the metric with the new tags. Defaults to true.

value_schema.description:
When set to true, the configuration overrides any existing
configurations for the given metric with the new set of tags in this
configuration request. If false, old configurations are kept and
are merged with the set of tags in this configuration request.
Defaults to true.
